turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two grande Verona coffees with cream and sugar

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the coffees ordered from the Starbucks at Great Crossing Mall in Auburn Hills?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want it from the Starbucks at Great Lakes Crossing mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need room for any cream in your cups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like plenty of room for cream in one cup but not the other.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many packets of sugar or Splenda would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want only one packet of brown sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the sugar to be added to the cups of coffee before delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add the sugar into the cups before serving.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How much cream would you like in your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add sufficient cream in both coffees.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time do you want it delivered to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the delivery within 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any cookies or salty snacks served with your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add two birthday cake flavored cake pops to my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the cake pops packed in separate bags?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. please pack the cake pops in two individual bags.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to try the new chocolate sprinkled cake pop?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I want to stick to the original birthday cake flavor.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want cup holders for your coffee??

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, cup holders would be great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to try our new flavor of the Frappe intoroduced yesterday?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'd like to confirm your order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please go ahead and confirm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two grande Verona coffees with sugar, cream in one coffee only.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two individually packed brithday cake flaovred cake pops.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is also correct. Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you for your business, your order will be delivered to you shortly.
